description: The 1st House in Aries indicates a personality that projects assertiveness and independence. People with this placement are often pioneering and like to take the initiative.
The 4th House in Cancer speaks to a deep connection with one's home and family. Individuals with this placement may find emotional security and comfort to be of utmost importance.
The 3th House in Libra suggests a strong orientation towards partnership. Those with this placement may seek harmony and balance in relationships and possess strong diplomatic skills.
